pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

Sill missing a lot of (d)simp lemmas :(

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: !bench
bors d+

:v: erdOne can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/d32af732-1153-4a79-af6b-331875c60dfc) for commit 7c2316ff2f405c827164087e93e6c5f43f9f30a3.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/2f5a9039-9754-4dd1-a563-00ed5a2dc336/to/d32af732-1153-4a79-af6b-331875c60dfc) against commit 730684c92655a41b391fa63c5a2717a26e201d95:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                      Metric         Change
  ====================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.Scheme           instructions   -25.3%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.StructureSheaf   instructions   -10.8%
```
I'll wait for @jjaassoonn before merging.
Thanks for tidying the files up! LGTM
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9141750710/job/25136537252)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9141750710/job/25136537386)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9141750710/job/25136537159)

Thanks a lot for doing this!

Let's bench it and merge afterwards if it isn't a slowdown. (I expect a speedup.)

Thanks a lot for doing this!

Let's bench it and merge afterwards if it isn't a slowdown. (I expect a speedup.)

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (q : Spec.T A_ f) (a : A) {n} (hn : a (n * m)) : ```
Maybe `eventually_mem_ideal_of_mem_carrier` instead, since the namespace does not enable dot notation.
I think both are fine

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(AlgebraicGeometry/ProjectiveSpectrum/Scheme): Tidy & golf
